# Sample Project Tasks

## Phase 1: Project Setup

### Task 1.1: Setup Project
**Description**: Initialize the test project structure

**Success Parameters**:
- [ ] Create directory structure
- [ ] Initialize package.json
- [ ] Set up basic configuration

### Task 2: Implement Feature
**Description**: Implement the main feature

**Success Parameters**:
- [ ] Write core functionality
- [ ] Add error handling
- [ ] Write tests

### Task 3: Documentation
**Description**: Document the project

**Success Parameters**:
- [ ] Write README
- [ ] Add code comments
- [ ] Create API documentation
